mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD where USER_NICKNM=#{userNicknm} ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT b.BOARD_NUM , b.USER_NICKNM , b.BOARD_SUBJECT , b.BOARD_CONTENT , b.BOARD_LIKECOUNT , b.BOARD_READCOUNT , b.BOARD_DATE , l.USER_ID FROM BOARD b JOIN BOARD_LIKE l on b.BOARD_NUM = l.BOARD_NUM where USER_ID=#{userId} ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT p.PROD_L_CODE , p.PROD_L_PRODNM , p.PROD_L_PRICE , p.PROD_L_MAINIMG , l.USER_ID FROM PRODUCT_LIST p JOIN PRODUCT_LIKE l on p.PROD_L_CODE = l.PROD_L_CODE where USER_ID=#{userId} ORDER BY PROD_L_NUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT l.ORD_L_CODE ,l.ORD_L_QUANTITY ,l.ORD_L_PRICE ,l.ORD_L_COUPONNUM ,l.ORD_DELIVERY_STATUS ,l.ORD_L_DELIV_NUMBER ,l.ORD_PURCHASESTATUS ,l.ORD_L_DATE ,l.ORD_L_NUM ,b.ORD_COUPONDC ,b.ORD_FINALPRICE FROM ORDER_LIST l join ORDER_BOARD b ON (l.ORD_L_NUM=b.NUM) WHERE l.ORD_L_USER= #{userId} ORDER BY l.ORD_L_DATE DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
